__e: Truth be told, Dorothy... I don't even know if I can keep up in that room.
Dorothy is a lunatic, just like her mother, and you know that.
What's most important right now is me taking care of Dorothy and Mama, 'cause... we kind of got a family problem right now.
Don't worry, Dorothy, there's nobody around.
Dorothy isn't the woman for you.
And Dorothy never indicated to me that she was going to be leaving town.
